Name: Indexed Country hors BP
Expression: {FILTER(TM1FILTERBYLEVEL(EXCEPT(TM1SUBSETALL([SLS_CUSTOMER].[SLS_CUSTOMER]) , DESCENDANTS([SLS_CUSTOMER].[IC1 - E00070])) , 0) , ((([SLS_CUSTOMER].[Country Name] = [zSELECT].(STRTOMEMBER("[}Clients].[" + USERNAME + "]"),[zSELECT_IND].[Country])))) AND ((([SLS_CUSTOMER].[Indexed Customer] = [zSELECT].(STRTOMEMBER("[}Clients].[" + USERNAME + "]"),[zSELECT_IND].[zIndexed_Customer])))))}
